definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man

sentences.chinese: 这个周末我要买古董去。

sentences.english: That's good. I was just wondering about how to spend my free time on weekends.
sentences.chinese: 太好了，我正在想怎么打发我的周末时间呢？

sentences.english: This weekend I'm going to install a home security system.
sentences.chinese: 这个周末我要装一套家庭保安系统。

sentences.english: Yes, we have a two-room apartment free after the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 对，这个周末以后我们可以腾出一套两居室的公寓。

sentences.english: Ecclestone said at the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix at the weekend that he had doubts about whether the race would happen.
sentences.chinese: 伯尼说这周末举行的阿布扎比大奖赛也可能被取消。

sentences.english: It's all set up very nicely for the Milan derby next weekend ...
sentences.chinese: 这对于下个周末的米兰德比是个不错的兆头。

sentences.english: Lily:I went to the Flora Expo last weekend. It was so crowded.
sentences.chinese: 我上个周末去花博，真是人挤人啊。

sentences.english: But he said you remember the week that rained?
sentences.chinese: 他却问我，你记得那个下雨的周末吗？

sentences.english: Last weekend, we called on our grandparents.
sentences.chinese: 上周末，我们拜望了祖父母。

sentences.english: I can't go hiking with you this weekend - I have to look after my kid.
sentences.chinese: 这周末我不能跟你们一起去爬山了，我要看孩子。

sentences.english: Don't stay up late on the weekends.
I ran into one of my classmates last weekend at Warner Village.
sentences.chinese: 我上周末在华纳威秀遇见我的一个同学。

sentences.english: Is Cousin Lin visiting us for the weekend?
sentences.chinese: 林表兄周末来看我们吗？

sentences.english: Give me two first-class retum tickets to Hastings, please.
sentences.chinese: 请给我一张周末回程的二等来回票。

sentences.english: Just your thoughts on qualifying and the race this weekend.
sentences.chinese: 你们对本周末排位赛跟比赛的想法。

sentences.english: Nesta looked off-pace over the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 内斯塔在周末看上去跟不上节奏。

definition: to have a holiday or vacation
